Package com.example.soroban.activity

package com.example.soroban.activity
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.example.soroban
     
    com.example.soroban.adapter
     
    com.example.soroban.controller
     
    com.example.soroban.fragment
     
    com.example.soroban.model
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminBrowseEventActivity
    Allows the admin to browse events from Firebase, search for events using a search bar, and view detailed information about a selected event.
    AdminBrowseFacilityActivity
    Allows administrators to browse and manage facilities.
    AdminBrowseImagesActivity
    Allows administrators to browse and manage user profile image stored in Firebase.
    AdminBrowseProfileActivity
    Allows administrators to browse user profiles.
    AdminDashboardActivity
    Serves as the main navigation hub for administrators.
    AdminViewEventActivity
    Responsible for displaying the details of a selected event and providing options to delete the event or its associated QR code.
    AdminViewFacilityActivity
    Displays the details of a selected facility and provides an option for administrators to delete the facility.
    AdminViewProfileActivity
    Displays the details of a selected user profile and allows administrators to delete the user's profile.
    BaseActivity
    Handles setting up side navigation bar
    CreateAccountActivity
    Makes user create their account if it is their first time opening the app
    CreateEventActivity
    Allows organizers to create new events by providing details such as event name, description, dates, and sample size.
    CreateFacilityActivity
    Allows users to create and set up their facility profiles.
    EventDetailsActivity
    Handles the display and management of event details.
    EventEntrantsGeolocationActivity
    Displays the geolocation of entrants for a selected event Allows organizers to view and interact with user locations on a map.
    EventEntrantsListActivity
    Allows event organizers to view and manage different categories of entrants (waitlisted, invited, confirmed, and cancelled) for a selected event.
    EventUsersCancelledActivity
    EventUsersCancelledActivity displays the list of users who have cancelled their participation in a selected event.
    EventUsersConfirmedActivity
    Displays the list of users who have confirmed their participation in a selected event.
    EventUsersInvitedActivity
    Displays the list of users invited to a specific event.
    EventUsersWaitlistedActivity
    Manages the list of users on the waitlist for a specific event.
    FacilityDisplayActivity
    Displays the details of a facility associated with the user.
    InvitationActivity
    Handles all functionalities related to notifications for the user.
    ManageFacilityActivity
    Allows the user to view and edit the details of an existing facility.
    OrganizerDashboardActivity
    Serves as the main dashboard for organizers.
    OrganizerEventEditDetailsActivity
     
    OrganizerEventViewDetailsActivity
    Allows organizers to view details of a specific event.
    PreferencesActivity
    Allows the user to manage application settings, specifically enabling or disabling notifications for the app.
    QrCodeScanActivity
    Handles the functionality for scanning QR codes and redirects the user to EventDetailsActivity with the scanned event data.
    UserDashboardActivity
    Displays the user's dashboard with options to scan QR codes, view notifications, manage preferences, and browse waitlisted and confirmed events.
    UserEventActivity
    Handles the display and management of an event the user is either registered for or waitlisted for, allowing the user to unregister or leave the waitlist.
